Texto: 
dense right sided hemiplegia and aphasia.
supportive.
• hyperdense mca sign on initial ct scan.
• m1 segment occlusion of left mca on angiogram
• m1 occlusion segment treated with intra arterial tpa
• follow up ct and mri reveal basal ganglion hemorrhage on the left.
mca infarct with basal ganglia hemorrhage
• cerebral infarct
• complications with hemorrhage following treatment with tpa
71 year old man presents with dense right sided hemiplegia and aphasia.
